message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $950,000, but that's my final offer. This product is truly unique, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that for you in the long run.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $925,000. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to go down to $940,000, but this is truly my final offer.  I'm confident this product will be a major asset to your business and will generate significant returns that far outweigh the cost.
Alice, I understand you're being firm on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go to $915,000, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me halfway?
